CheckTitle: Check if backup vault has a policy to prevent deletion of recovery points
Description: Ensure that backup vaults have resource-based policies preventing deletion of recovery points.
Risk: Backup vaults without such policies are at risk of accidental or malicious deletion of recovery points, leading to potential data loss.

Recommendation.Text: Attach a resource-based policy to your backup vaults that includes a 'Deny' statement to prevent deletion of recovery points. Regularly review and update the policies to ensure they meet your data protection requirements.

Notes: Regularly audit your backup vault policies to ensure they include the necessary permissions to prevent deletion of recovery points.
